overview:
Genuine Machining Systems

We, a renowned manufacturer of a wide array of industrial supplies; ranging from safety valves & oil level gauge to medical components & muffler bantam. Every piece by us is precisely engineered to suit the clientâ€™s requirements.

Established in the year of 2002, we at Genuine Machining systems are engaged in manufacturing regulators, valves, gauges, proportional regulator, oil level gauge, clamping elements, servo cylinder, medical components and others.

Our products are efficiently manufactured from top grade raw material, the continuum of our products include Safety valve, Pilot operated valve, Servo cylinder, Quick exhaust valve, Minimum pressure valve, Proportional regulator, Non return valve, Oil Stop Valve, Electro magnetic valve and Fuel solenoid valve, Oil level gauge and Oil level Plug, Medical component & accessories and Precision Muffler.

From the very date of our establishment we have paid special heed in consistent maintenance of the quality of the products manufactured by us. Our internationally reckoned engineering equipments & medical components have helped us in acquiring massive orders in both domestic and global regions.

Phone : +(91)-(422)-2696307
